message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, potentially even more so than to me.  To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,150,000. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I believe the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,125,000. This is my final offer, as I have another interested buyer.
I understand your position, Alice. I'll make one last attempt to reach an agreement. My counteroffer is $1,075,000. I hope we can find common ground.
